scripts.all: npm run ergo && npm run stl
scripts.angled: npm run ergo && npm run angled-cases
scripts.angled-cases: for i in output/cases/angled*.jscad; do npx @jscad/cli@1 "$i" -of stla; done
scripts.sandwich: npm run ergo && npm run sandwich-cases
scripts.sandwich-cases: for i in output/cases/sandwich*.jscad; do npx @jscad/cli@1 "$i" -of stla; done
scripts.stl: for i in output/cases/*.jscad; do npx @jscad/cli@1 "$i" -of stla; done
